sentence.Network_en: When they were quite out of sight, Phineas began to bestir himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 等他们走得无影无踪之后, 斐尼亚斯便开始行动起来.

sentence.Network_en: He was too lazy to bestir himself even to answer the telephone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他懒得甚至不愿接电话.

sentence.Network_en: You will fail unless you bestir yourself.
sentence.Network_cn: 你必须努力,否则就要失败.

list.abs: You must bestir yourself to take the necessary action ., 你必须自我振作去采取必要的行动.
bestir yourself and enjoy the life at the moment .激励自己和享受生活。

auth_sentence.content: "Well, I did not know that," Walter says, but does not bestir himself to move away.
